name: R&D costs paid for by the company and others projected for 2017, by industry and company size: 2016
description: R&D costs paid for by the company and others projected for 2017, by industry and company size: 2016

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_projected_worldwide_r_d_cost_paid_for_by_the_company
variableMeasured.description: Projected Worldwide R D Cost Paid For By The Company

variableMeasured.name: field_projected_worldwide_r_d_cost_paid_for_by_others
variableMeasured.description: Projected Worldwide R D Cost Paid For By Others

variableMeasured.name: field_projected_domestic_r_d_cost_paid_for_by_the_company_total
variableMeasured.description: Projected Domestic R D Cost Paid For By The Company Total

variableMeasured.name: field_projected_domestic_r_d_cost_paid_for_by_the_company_purchased_and_collaborative_r_d
variableMeasured.description: Projected Domestic R D Cost Paid For By The Company Purchased And Collaborative R D

variableMeasured.name: field_projected_domestic_r_d_cost_paid_for_by_the_company_r_d_performed_by_the_company
variableMeasured.description: Projected Domestic R D Cost Paid For By The Company R D Performed By The Company

variableMeasured.name: field_projected_domestic_r_d_cost_paid_for_by_others_total
variableMeasured.description: Projected Domestic R D Cost Paid For By Others Total

variableMeasured.name: field_projected_domestic_r_d_cost_paid_for_by_others_u_s_government
variableMeasured.description: Projected Domestic R D Cost Paid For By Others U S Government

variableMeasured.name: field_projected_domestic_r_d_cost_paid_for_by_others_non_u_s_government_sources
variableMeasured.description: Projected Domestic R D Cost Paid For By Others Non U S Government Sources

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification is based on the dominant business code for domestic R&D performance, where available. For companies that did not report business codes, the classification used for sampling was assigned. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D.
sources: National Science Foundation, National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, and U.S. Census Bureau, Business R&D and Innovation Survey, 2016.
